message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but hopefully we can work out a more balanced split in future rounds.
Your share is decreasing quickly with inflation. I'm offering a more reasonable split this time, but we need to reach an agreement soon.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise, but I need to see more than a 50/50 split. Let's meet halfway.
The value is slipping away with each round. I'm offering a 60/40 split.  Let's settle this now and both benefit.
We're getting closer to the end of the game. Let's just split it evenly and both walk away with something.
